sentences.sContent: However, you will be amazed at how quickly they catch on and how engrossed in their homework they will be simply by taking this approach.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, you will be amazed at how quickly they catch on and how engrossed in their homework they will be simply by taking this approach.
sentences.sCn: 然而，你会吃惊的发现他们会很快的抓住要点并沉浸在他们的作业中，用这个方法，作业变得很简单。
